name: insomnia
text: "Doctor Kisses: The Tragedy" would make a pretty good Broadway show.

name: apocowarg
text: Kevin Spacey would so want to play Doctor. Kisses.

name: hipjiverobot
text:
WHY DOCTOR KISSES?

Why not Bite-Bite, or Fingers?

name: atlanticcity
text: Oh I think you know.

name: carlyle
text: I don't think I want too!

name: epicurus
text: As part of his or her medical Oath, Dr. Kisses has accepted some responsibility vis-a-vis the health of others.

name: jamb23
text: You must have an amazingly generous doctor.

name: deimosrising
text: The last panel is one of the funniest in Achewood's whole history, in mine own humble opinion.

name: catachresis
text: Ray thinks you have to shoot an Aibo to harvest its lung. It is so hard.

name: saint
text: i love how he wakes up, sees the doctor, and seems surprised to see him. "OH! HEY!"

name: luckypyjamas
text:
also that his genius idea came to him in a dream

one can only speculate on what ray's dreams are like

name: juancarlos
text: Ray loves respectability, the dog can't be just called Mr Kisses, he has to have a doctorate.

name: snowman
text: That dog did not go to robotic dog medical school for 8 years to be called mister .

name: jimbob
text: He is not a robotic dog surgeon .

name: ih8jonmayr
text: His specialty: HUUUUUGS!!!

name: supadupa
text: Amen, I can't stop laughing at that... My next dog is getting that name.

name: tekende
text: I'm still waiting to name a dog Mr. Poopytime.

name: werewolves
text: or J.J. the Land-Retard

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Great, Great, Great !

name: fuzzyshoo
text: Or Slow-Lane

name: waddlerz
text: I just wish it wasn't Dr. Kisses.  Chubby for your post.

name: deimosrising
text: It is a hard sacrifice to make but no other name would have been as funny

name: waddlerz
text: True true, and he does have 33 others

name: catachresis
text: "Drunk in Heaven" is going to be my epitaph.

name: sargasm
text: I am almost about to make sure I die first so that it can be mine.  Almost.  It is that good.

name: epicurus
text: That is awesome . When you die come tell me so I can visit your grave.

name: quantumcasaba
text: And then.. well, my van's really been acting up. Would you mind taking a look at it?

name: wonelove
text:
Nah, he'll be too drunk in heaven anyways.
don't expect anything

name: philophobe
text: Drunk as a lord .

name: spinynorman
text: Who here is known to drink alone? I have done so on many occasions.

name: quantumcasaba
text: Does it count if you're the only one drinking in a group of people, and no one knows that you're drinking?

name: stuart
text: If they couldn't discern that you were drinking then you weren't drinking hard enough to qualify

name: philophobe
text: Do you think it is rad to have alcoholism, quantumcasaba?

name: landowmpg
text: I have done this, not to conceal that I was drinking, but so that I didn't have to share.  Once I drank a pre-mixed 26 out of my jacket pocket during a movie I was seeing with friends, by connecting theatre straws together to make one giant straw, so that it would reach all the way from the bottom of the bottle to my mouth with minimal head-tilting.  I cannot think of a clever name for this.

name: pearced
text: Stephen Hawking?

name: fineoakstructure
text: That...is really good.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Ketel One Koans:

If a quantumcasaba is drinking in a group, but no one knows that he's drinking... is he actually drinking?

name: sp1derbaby
text: A rare few occasions, all of which have been tremendously fun. A bottle of banana liquor, a 100W guitar amp, an empty campus building...

name: sp1derbaby
text: "liqueur" even. The "eu" is French.

name: spinynorman
text:
Man, hooch is hooch, your guts don't speak french

Also "hooch" is a ton more fun to say

name: sp1derbaby
text: There's no point arguing with the valet. Pass the hooch, Jeeves!

name: tekende
text:
I do so every now and then.

Unless you count having one beer as actively drinking alone, in which case I do it all the time.

name: spinynorman
text: Naw, having a beer or two doesn't qualify as "drinking" unless you're in Utah or a similarly dry state.

name: tegebo
text: I run out da clock with bourbon many a night.

name: zapatos
text: It is alright spinynorman, I drink alone.  When I am not drinking, bad things happen.  Sometimes I'll be acting weird, maybe too loud or tripping over things.  My body shakes and I yell for no reason.  Sometimes those things don't happen.  Sometimes I am not sober.

name: mal3
text:
I, too, drink alone more often then I drink with friends.

Scotch is my best friend ever.

name: varnish
text: God loves a drunk.

name: zombieman
text: ARF!

name: antsama
text: This is one of the hardest decisions of Ray's life.

name: giantants
text:
Cure song: Killing an AIBO.
(sorry)

name: snowman
text: this is funny if you picture it with the tune and music and everything.

name: relaxing
text:
I'm alive!
I'm dead!

name: behka
text: we all will love doctor kisses!

name: mcwee
text: A BLO, A BLA, A BLOOO OO OO

name: zeroasalimit
text: Yeah, I'm kinda sad that isn't the one he is doing and it is just a sob. My favourite arc for Ray crying is Trent Reznor's car.

name: tetrisattack
text: Heaven is a place where nothing ever happens

name: i_love_kate
text: Seriously, stop it!

name: tekende
text: I hate you. Seriously. Every time I see one of your comments I think "man, what a dick " and now that you don't post anymore I feel safe in saying this.

name: philosophe
text: It sounds like Ray is making a mix tape.

name: songbirdspectre
text:
(oh my god this is so hard)

5.

name: cousinted
text:
"Lie Bot; What is the saddest thing?"

"Having to kill your beloved dog in order to save your best friend"

name: rachel
text: the sadddest thing would be not knowing that that wouldn't work and your best friend dies in your arms, just wanting to know how dr kisses is

name: greenkoolayd
text: that was so sad it made my soul hurt.

name: molesticide
text: other strips are better, but the final panel is better than every strip.

name: spinynorman
text: ROBOPUPPY MISTREATMENT ALERT! ROBOPUPPY MISTREATMENT ALERT!

name: landowmpg
text: ROBOPUPPY COMMENCING TWO-HOUR YIPPING SESSION.  YIP YIP YIP YIP YIP YIP...

name: riazm
text: I love the way Dr Andretti realises that harvesting a lung to replace a lung makes no sense.

name: ohmygooses
text:
captain pedantic here to inform you that Dr Andretti had no such intention, and Ray just fell asleep on the medical table

but it's cool it's hard to keep up with these shennanigans

name: riazm
text:
I thought he was under anesthetic, but that's never explicitly stated.

YOU WIN THIS ROUND CAPTAIN PEDANT.

name: darthemed
text: Pedantic, not pedant.

name: riazm
text:
Oh hey darthemed, you're my mom aren't you? Is that..the car of pain?

You want me to get...into the car of pain? Where...where are you taking me darthemed?

To...to school?

name: presterjohn
text:
Oh ho ho ho what a delightfully self-aware correction.

unfortunately the two words are equally appropriate here so you are less a pedant and more just a dick.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Actually I think the point darthemed was making was that ohmygooses originally referred to himself as "captain pedantic", so even though both words in this context have the exact same effect semantically, with the history of the conversation, darthemeds pedantry was completely justified.

Hahaha I love pretending that I'm smart.

name: ershin
text: Doctor Kisses slain by Tic-Tac.  Sad times.

name: deovalente
text: "Lie Bot, what is the saddest thing?"

name: wulvaine
text: A comment left by wulvaine was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, razznixx, rachel)

name: charchar
text: Soda guns...I would totally try to get Einstein and Tesla and Oscar Wilde to come over and into a soda gun fight.  They'd get tonic in the brocade and moustaches.  That is heaven.

name: i_love_kate
text:
In heaven, Oscar Wilde and Einstein are extremely busy.

Tesla often wonders why no-one ever calls.

name: silentman
text: The alt-text is a pretty blatant lie.

name: kendieatsbabies
text: I just recently had to put down a family dog, and to my horror, all I could think of was the last panel of this strip.  I'm an awful, awful person.

name: tegebo
text: Hey man, if it takes your mind off of what you gotta do, I say embrace it.

name: xndrew
text: God damn man, I named my dog after the robo-dog he kills. What the hell.

name: wittyname
text: In this strip, a cat shoots his robot pet dog for it's lung.

name: zapatos
text:
Hell of loving this arc, fours all around!

Fives are overrated anymore.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
fave line:

oh my God this is so hard

name: theirateturk
text: Soda guns fucking suck and have no place in my vision of heaven.

name: carlyle
text: Man eternity is gonna fucking blow when I am dead.

name: nixnada
text: That last panel has me welling up, every time.

name: sevenslashfour
text: I feel bad for laughing as hard as I did at the last panel :(

name: freakywonton
text: man I would get ALL kinds of fucked up in heaven

name: quantumcasaba
text: I find myself endlessly amused every time Ray blubbers.

name: a386
text: did beef just spray some soda on the floor?

name: origotoshi
text: It's heaven. They probably have janitors. Or messes just disappear magically. Though I suppose it would be hard to have a good rage if the stuff you're throwing around just goes poof...
